reporter_caption.center: PULVERMANN v. PROBATE APPEAL, No. FST CV 05 4005187 (Mar. 23, 2007)

court.center: Judicial District of Stamford-Norwalk at Stamford

unpublished.footnote_body: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.]

opinion_text.unpublished:
The defendants' motion for summary judgment is denied in accordance with the court's decision in Sandford v. Probate Appeal, Superior Court, judicial district of Stamford-Norwalk at Stamford, CV 05 4005186.
CT Page 8638
